body:
Welcome to My Page


`

in This part of my text, i will share a game that i played when im in senior high school. This simple game makes players become addictive. So i make this in python language.
as the game in general, we need some modules to make game has a sense. How to work the game? we just guess 4 numbers hidden by computer, the numbers that we enter, must be the same as  the numbers that are hidden by the computer both the number and the order.
this is the script,: 

[guess.py](https://github.com/downloads/arifazik/arifazik.github.com/tebak.py)

have fun..
name: Arifazik.github.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
